name: Bastard Bonds
description: Bastard Bonds is a mature, fast-paced tactical RPG with high-end pixel art and in-depth character customization.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2Ghz or faster processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRam Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 screen resolution or larger, keyboard and mouse
